name: OE
0:
”Alexa, turn on the kitch-light.”
”Alexa, turn off the curtain.”
”Alexa, dim living room.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With alexa, you can control your lights, outlets, curtains, and all the OE products.
First of all, you should download and install our app: OE.
Second, you should buy at least one gateway device of ours.

Now let's see jobs rest:
1. Open OE app, register and login OE account.
2. When loading to main page, click the "+" icon on the right top and click "Add devices" in the menu popped.
3. Add all your lights, plugs, curtains and any OE products including the OE gateway.
4. When all devices are added, please click the new added OE gateway and configure the WiFi info: SSID and password.

Now, all the job in OE app is down, you can try to control all your device there for test and fun. And all the device should work perfectly.
Let's start setup your alexa and skills:
1. In your alexa app, click left-top menu icon and select "Skills" and search "OE".
2. Enable "OE" skill and this will lead you to the login page.
3. Input your OE account and password and go next.
4. Select the network to be controlled by alexa and done.

That's all, you can control your devices with alexa now!
